name: Next - Savoy Signature
address: Rua Carvalho Araújo 8, 9000-022 Funchal, Madeira
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Funchal, NEXT - by Savoy Signature provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness centre. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a garden, as well as a sauna. A terrace, an on-site bar and shared lounge are available. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. Each room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, while selected rooms are fitted with a kitchenette fitted with a fridge. At NEXT - by Savoy Signature each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak German, English, French and Portuguese. Popular points of interest near NEXT - by Savoy Signature include Almirante Reis Beach, Marina do Funchal and Madeira Casino. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Barcelo Funchal Oldtown
address: Rua Da Alfandega 9, 9000-059 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Casa Velha do Palheiro
address: Rua De Estalagem 23, 9060-415 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Enotel Lido
address: Rua Simplicio Dos Passos Gouveia, 29, 9004-576 Funchal, Madeira
description: This stunning hotel basks in its enchanting location, lying just a few steps away from the sea. Guests will find themselves just a short distance away from the town centre, offering the ideal setting from which to explore the delights that the area has to offer. The hotel is located within easy access of a host of shopping opportunities and dining options. This charming hotel features beautifully-appointed guest rooms, which are well equipped with modern amenities for added comfort and convenience. Guests can enjoy a leisurely swim in the pool, relax and unwind in the sauna, or enjoy the ultimate rejuvenation in the spa. Guests can also enjoy an energetic workout in the in-house gym.FarePortal

name: The Vine
address: Rua Dos Aranhas 27 - A, 9000-039 Funchal, Madeira
description: Recently awarded as Europe's Leading Design Hotel, the luxurious Vine Hotel is located in Funchal and offers a fusion restaurant with stunning views, a Wine Therapy Spa, access to the fitness centre and a rooftop infinity pool. The spacious rooms are individually designed following the 4-seasons-of-the-year theme. Each features an LCD TV with in-room movies, free WiFi and a laptop-size safe. The roof terrace sports a infinity pool, massage facilities and a 20-metre hot tub with views of Fort São João and the mountains. For further relaxation, Hotel Vine’s spa offers vinotherapy. The rooftop restaurant serves a blend of French and Madeiran cuisine prepared from regional produce. Guests can enjoy cocktails and snacks at the Bar 360°. The Palheiro Golf Course (15 km) and the Santo da Serra Golf Course (25 km) are only a short drive from The Vine Hotel.

name: Castanheiro Boutique Hotel
address: Rua do Castanheiro 31, 9000-081 Funchal, Madeira
description: Offering an outdoor pool and spa centre, Castanheiro Boutique Hotel is set in Funchal, 500 metres from Marina do Funchal. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. Castanheiro Boutique Hotel features a SPA with hydrotherapy pool, sauna, turkish bath,massage rooms and a relaxing area. You will also find a hairdresser's at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. CIFEC - Madeira Congress Center is 2 km from Castanheiro Boutique Hotel, while Parque Ecologico do Funchal is 6 km away. Madeira Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Allegro Madeira Adults Only
address: Rua Gorgulho NR 1, 9004-540 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Pestana Carlton Madeira
address: Largo António Nobre, nº 1, 9004-531 Funchal, Madeira
description: Offering 4 restaurants, 2 bars and Atlantic Ocean views, the 5-star Pestana Carlton Madeira Ocean Resort Hotel is situated on a cliff top on Madeira Island. Funchal’s centre is 10 minutes' walk away. Pestana Carlton Madeira's leisure offer includes a giant chess board, a certified, on-site diving school and a tennis court. All suites and rooms feature elegant décor, flat-screen TVs and balconies with sea, mountain or pool views. One of the 2 saltwater pools has stairs leading to the sea. For relaxation, Pestana's Venus Health Spa includes an indoor heated pool, Scottish shower and massage treatments. Guests can choose from the rustic atmosphere of the hotel's Taverna Grill or by the cool pool and gardenside setting of the Garden Pool Restaurante & Bar. Activities such as paragliding, yacht excursions and windsurfing are available nearby. The Pestana Carlton Madeira Ocean Resort Hotel is a 20-minute drive from Madeira's International Airport. Private parking is available, at an extra fee.

name: Pestana Casino Park
address: Rua Imperatriz D. Amélia, 55, 9004-513 Funchal, Madeira
description: Overlooking the Bay of Funchal, this well designed hotel provides luxury accommodation within Santa Caterina Park. There is a spa with pools for relaxation and a casino and discotheque for entertainment. Featuring private balconies, all rooms at the Pestana Casino Park Hotel & Casino come with seating areas and satellite LCD TVs. Many guest rooms provide a panoramic view of the Atlantic Ocean. Pestana’s 6 dining venues include the Panoramic Restaurant with far-reaching views of the Bay and pool area. The Aqua overlooks the hotel’s gardens and casino, while the sunset Restaurant offers a varied menu and a cocktail bar. Guests can relax in the indoor or outdoor pools, exercise in the fitness centre or enjoy one of the quality treatments available from the Pestana Spa. The hotel arranges diverse recreational activities including hiking and diving. Pestana Casino Park is just a 5-minute walk from the town centre and 30 minutes’ drive from Madeira Airport. Parking is available on site, upon an extra fee.

name: Saccharum - Hedonist Design Resort
address: Rua Serra de Água, 1, 9370-083 Estreito da Calheta, Madeira
description: Timezone: Atlantic/Madeira Located in Calheta, Savoy Saccharum Resort & Spa is by the sea, within a 10-minute drive of Church of Our Lady of Light and Beachside Square. This 5-star hotel is 19.1 mi (30.8 km) from CR7 Museum and 19.5 mi (31.3 km) from Funchal Marina. Make yourself at home in one of the 243 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a health club, and a sauna. This Art Deco hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 3 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Expedia

name: Enotel Sunset Bay
address: Avenida 1 de Maio, 9360-209 Ponta do Sol, Madeira
description: Enotel Sunset Bay, shining with the setting of the sun warm Madeira, is located on the seafront and is situated 20 minutes from Funchal and 40 minutes from the airport.It is the ideal place to admire and discover the charms of the friendly village of Ponta do Sol, full of culture and tradition.iHotelier/iStay

name: Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature
address: Avenida do Infante, 25, 9004-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located in Funchal, 1.7 km from Almirante Reis Beach, Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Featuring room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature every room comes with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, Italian or American breakfast is available daily at the property. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gorgulho - Gavinas Beach, Marina do Funchal and Madeira Casino. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 20 km from Savoy Palace - The Leading Hotels of the World - Savoy Signature.

name: Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden
address: Estrada Ponta Da Oliveira, 11, 9125-001 Caniço, Madeira
description: Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden is situated in a restored 19th-century manor house on 30,000 m² of landscaped botanical gardens. It features panoramic Atlantic Ocean views, indoor pool and one of the largest spas in Madeira, with 10 treatment rooms. Free WiFi access is available. Rooms at the Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden feature private balconies and modern furnishings. They come equipped with satellite TV and a minibar. Some units also include a kitchenette. The hotel provides a variety of dining options At La Perla guests can enjoy gourmet Portuguese cuisine. There is a Thai lounge, a cocktail bar, and a restaurant overlooking the pool that serves salads and smoothies. At the Botanical Garden guests can relax in a sun lounger by the pool, or play a game of billiards. The spa centre includes a Finnish sauna and an ice pool. Nearby leisure activities include golfing, diving and whale watching. Quinta Splendida Wellness & Botanical Garden is located 100 metres from the centre of Caniço and is 7 km from Funchal. The hotel has a tour desk that rents bicycles and assists with car hire.

name: Estalagem Da Ponta Do Sol
address: Quinta da Rochinha nº6, 9360 Ponta do Sol, Madeira
description: Perched on a cliff facing the Atlantic Ocean, this design hotel is within a renovated traditional farmhouse. Set on Madeira’s South Coast, Ponta do Sol has a stunning infinity pool and hot tub with panoramic views. Floor-to-ceiling windows lead from the hotel guestrooms out onto balconies. Some rooms provide sea views, others overlook the garden. The total-white décor is complemented by flat-screen cable TVs. A game of tennis can be enjoyed on the court, located a 2-minute walk from the Estalagem Da Ponta Do Sol. Guests can also relax the spa & wellness centre where a sauna and massage therapies are provided. Boasting the most hours of sunshine in Madeira, Ponta Do Sol village is just minutes from the hotel and can be reached with free bikes.

name: Hotel Alto Lido
address: Estrada Monumental, 316, 9004-529 Funchal, Madeira
description: Renovated in 2018, the 4-star Hotel Alto Lido is located in Funchal’s prime area – Lido, 2.5 km from the city centre. It offers an indoor and an outdoor heated swimming pool as well as a pool for children and Spa facilities. Hotel Alto Lido includes modernly decorated rooms, suites and studios with frontal or side se views. Each accommodation is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, air conditioning, telephone, safety deposit box and free WiFi. Studios have fully equipped kitchenette. On site, guests can choose amongst 3 restaurants. The Flôr de Sal restaurant is a buffet restaurant on the ground floor and serves local specialties. On the 1st floor, The Tale offers an ample veranda with sea views and a carefully prepared à la carte menu. Linha de Água offers light meals and salads by the outdoor pool. In addition, guests may enjoy live music and a cocktail at the 360 bar. Guests have a gym and cardio-fitness facilities at their disposal as well as a sauna and a Turkish bath. There are 2 conference rooms with capacity for 80 and 100 persons, a laundry service and a games room. Private shuttle service to the centre of Funchal is available 4 times per day. Funchal International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Quinta da Casa Branca
address: Rua Casa Branca 7, 9000-088 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within extensive gardens of various subtropical trees and a banana plantation, Quinta da Casa Branca features a boutique hotel and an elegant manor house and offers a heated pool and rooms with garden views. There is a spa room and two restaurants at the property. Free WiFi access, tea and coffee making facilities and a private balcony or terrace overlooking the gardens are available in all accommodations. Each of the private bathrooms is comfortably equipped with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The Health Club is equipped with a fitness training room, sauna, steam bath, hot tub and a relaxation room. The Frangipani Spa room offers massages and beauty treatments. An outdoor heated swimming pool and communal relaxation spaces in the gardens are also provided, offering guests peaceful settings to relax or peruse a book. Set in the Manor House, “The Dining Room” Restaurant has an al fresco dining terrace and offers fine Mediterranean cuisine, à la carte or table d’hôte. Amongst the gardens, the “Garden Pavilion” Restaurant is set in a modern wooden glass building with a terrace and offers buffet breakfast, lunch and snacks. Quinta da Casa Branca's 24-hour reception staff can arrange private jeep tours around the Island, Levada walks, sailing trips, car and bike rentals and airport private transfers. Madeira Airport is 20 km away from Quinta da Casa Branca and Funchal city centre is 2 km away.

name: Enotel Magnólia
address: Rua Dr Pita 6, 9000-089 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: PortoBay Serra Golf
address: Sítio Dos Casais Próximos, - 0 ., 9100-255 Santo Antonio da Serra, Madeira
description: PortoBay Serra Golf is a small charming estate with tasteful decoration, surrounded by nature and Madeiran traditions. with the golf course nearby!! Feel like you're in the heart of the country, with luxurious greenery, and a welcoming environments. The main house, dating from 1920, was restored in 1999 and is classified as part of the region's heritage. The faade, with decorative elements from the Art Nouveaux period, the frieze of floral tiles, windows with white wooden slats, and its fish-scale roof are unique features. In the PortoBay Serra Golf garden there are over 90 species, subspecies and a variety of flowers and plants to be found, some of them found only on the island, and all duly identified.iHotelier/iStay

name: Pestana Grand
address: 23 Rua da Ponta da Cruz, 9000-103 Funchal, Madeira
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, the seaside Pestana Grand Ocean Resort Hotel features the largest salt water pool on the Madeira Island. The hotel offers fine dining and access to the Funchal coastline promenade. The resort is set on the rock of Ponta da Cruz, with views of the high sea cliffs of Cabo Girão. Its bright interiors have large windows, designed to let in plenty of natural light. Pestana Grand Ocean Resort Hotel has a full-scale spa with steam baths, saunas, and hot tubes. Guests can work out at the gym, have a relaxing massage or swim in the panoramic indoor pool. The Pestana Grand's rooms include private balconies. Each is air conditioned and has an en suite bathroom with a bathtub. The hotel offers an extensive range of restaurants, including fine Moroccan, Italian and Portuguese cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink in the piano bar, or a fine cigar in the lounge. Free Private parking is available and is subject to availability.

name: Pestana Promenade
address: Rua Simplicio Dos Passos Gouveia, #31, 9000-001 Funchal, Madeira
description: The 4-star Pestana Promenade Ocean Resort Hotel in Funchal is close to the Lido and offers direct access to the promenade that stretches to Praia Formosa. It features indoor and outdoor pools, an outdoor hot tub, a spa and gym. The bright and airy rooms at the Pestana Promenade Ocean Resort Hotel have hardwood floors. They feature Atlantic Ocean views from the balcony, and include modern amenities such as air conditioning and a private bathroom with complimentary soaps and shampoos. The stylish restaurant at the Pestana Ocean Resort serves authentic local specialities. Meals and refreshing drinks can also be enjoyed al fresco on the terrace, which is surrounded by an exotic garden and palm trees. The Promenade’s spa features a range of relaxation options, including a sauna and a Turkish bath. More active guests can work out with cardiovascular equipment and free weights at the modern gym. Parking is available, at an extra fee. A 24-hour front desk is among the convenient amenities offered by the hotel.

name: Quinta Jardins Do Lago
address: Rua Dr. Joao Lemos Gomes 29, 9000-208 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located in the hills surrounding Funchal, this 18th-century mansion is set in extensive botanical gardens with 600 different plant species. All rooms have balconies overlooking the gardens. Quinta Jardins do Lago's spacious rooms are elegantly furnished and include a seating area, a marble bathroom and a large balcony. Each room features air conditioning, cable TV and free WiFi. Beresford Restaurant, available daily for evening meals, is an indoor restaurant where Madeira and International cuisine melt. There are 2 bars, one of which is a poolside bar surrounded by mango trees and flowers. Quinta Jardins do Lago has a large lagoon-style swimming pool surrounded by sun terraces with sun beds. Guests can work out in the gym or spend the afternoon in the sauna, Turkish bath and hot tub. This luxurious boutique hotel is situated 1.5 km from the centre of Funchal. Free parking is available, and a free shuttle service to and from the city centre is available upon request. Madeira International Airport is 18 km from Quinta Jardins do Lago.

name: Pestana CR7 Funchal
address: Av. Sá Carneiro, Praça do Mar, 9000-017 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located in scenic Madeira Island, Pestana CR7 Funchal results of a partnership between Pestana Hotels and world-renowned footballer Cristiano Ronaldo. The elegant 4-star hotel has an outdoor pool and is 300 metres from Funchal Marina. The Pestana CR7 offers accommodation in double rooms, with plenty of natural light and a private bathroom, including free toiletries. These rooms are all air conditioned and come with a mini bar and a safety deposit box. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The hotel’s in-house restaurant has a varied menu, which includes a selection of quality salads, pizzas and hamburgers, all produced from fresh local products. There’s also a bar, where guests can get a refreshing drink or cocktail to cap off the day after a tour of the island. Following a dip in the outdoor swimming pool, guests can also enjoy a workout in the outdoor gym. Massages are available for booking, upon request and at an extra fee. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property, available to help out guests during their stay. Guests have free admission to the Cristiano Ronaldo Museu, located right next to the Hotel. The Madeira Casino is just 200 metres from the property, while Madeira Shopping is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Madeira Airport, 23.5 km from Pestana CR7 Funchal.

name: Tui Blue Gardens - Adults Only - Savoy Signature
address: Azinhaga da Casa Branca, 320, 9000-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: Nestled against an oceanfront hillside, this quiet adult-only hotel boasts a heated outdoor pool, a sauna, and a hot tub. It offers panoramic mountain and sea views, and is located in the Lido area. Tui Blue Gardens features guest rooms with modern furnishings, and balconies that overlook the Atlantic Ocean. Each spacious room comes with satellite TV, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Guests can enjoy live cooking and themed buffets for breakfast and dinner. Romantic and al-fresco dining is also available upon request. During the day, guests can relax on the rooftop terrace and get a drink from the honesty bar. In the evenings, The Tui Blue Gardens night club offers live music and a variety of shows. Tui Blue Gardens is just 2 km from the Funchal city centre and in situated near various public parks and shops. Paid private parking is possible on site

name: Vila Gale Santa Cruz
address: Rua De Sao Fernando, 5, 9100-157 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Overlooking the Atlantic Ocean in a tranquil area of Madeira, Vila Galé offers deluxe accommodation with a wellness centre. It features a pool, beauty treatments and nearby golf facilities. Fitted with anti-allergic duvets and modern furnishings, rooms at Vila Galé Santa Cruz all open out onto private balconies. Each includes a TV set with satellite channels, DVD and CD players. Bathrooms are en suite. On-site Versatil Restaurant serves regional specialities and international cuisine throughout the day. Inevitável Pasta Lounge offers a la carte dishes during lunch and dinner, with an accent on Mediterranean food. Madeira International Airport and Pico do Cruz Mountain are both within a 5-minute drive from Santa Cruz Vila Galé.

name: Calheta Beach
address: Vila Da Calheta, 9370-133 Estreito da Calheta, Madeira
description: No description found

name: The Views Baia - Adults Only
address: Rua Das Maravilhas, 74, 9000-177 Funchal, Madeira
description: Featuring views of Funchal Bay, The Views Baia - Adults Only Hotel offers modern accommodation. Facilities include the Four Feelings Spa, 2 swimming pools, and a well-equipped gym. Rooms at the Four Views open onto private balconies overlooking the Atlantic Ocean or the mountains. All rooms have bathrooms with walk-in showers, and some rooms have cooking facilities or a private spa bath. A varied menu of Mediterranean, international and vegetarian dishes is served at the Bay View Restaurant. Guests can enjoy drinks and cocktails accompanied by live music at the Woogie Boogie Bar. A hot tub, massage treatments and indoor and outdoor swimming pools are available. The Hotel The Views Baia - Adults Only is located uphill from São João Fortress. It is 30 minutes’ drive from Madeira Airport and on-site private parking is free.

name: Madeira Regency Cliff
address: Rua da Quinta da Calaca, 6, 9000-108 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Madeira Regency Cliff - Adults Only is a 4-star boutique Hotel offering panoramic Atlantic Ocean views from its cliff-top location. It offers indoor and outdoor pools and massage treatments. The contemporary rooms offer a furnished balcony where guests can relax with a drink from the minibar. Modern amenities include flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms feature a seating area and dining furniture. A workout can be enjoyed in the well-equipped gym. For relaxation, Madeira Regency Cliff - Adults Only offers a Turkish bath. Guests can also unwind in the tranquil surroundings of the landscaped garden. Mistral Restaurant offers a rich breakfast buffet and a terrace overlooking the Ocean. In the evening, local and international cuisine is served. Monte Palace Tropical Garden and Santa Clara Monastery are both less than a 10-minute walk away.

name: Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature
address: Rua Carvalho Araujo 1, 9000-022 Funchal, Madeira
description: The luxurious Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort is set amidst tropical gardens in the Bay of Funchal, featuring 2 heated lagoon-style pools and private ocean access. The 5-star hotel combines exotically decorated interiors and contemporary architecture." All the stylish suites and rooms are beautifully decorated and have sophisticated furnishings, as well as a private balcony with panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean. Each has a modern bathroom with free toiletries and the suites have a full kitchenette. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature also boasts a poolside bar and a bar with nightly live music and refreshing cocktails. Guests may have a taste of exquisite Portuguese flavours at The Armada, an à la carte and buffet restaurant, which also offers international cuisine options. Following a day of touring the island and enjoying the sights, guests may unwind at the spa, an ideal spot for a relaxing massage, a visit to the gym or indoor pool. Guests can soak up the sun on the extensive ocean front solarium. The attentive staff can organise various off-site activities, including arrangements for golf as well as provide a rental car service. The Funchal Marina is a 14-minute walk from the Hotel. Guests may also try their luck at the slot machines of Madeira Casino, which is 700 metres away. The greenery of Madeira's Botanical Gardens is 4 km away, while the stunning views of Girão Cape are within 12 km. The Royal Savoy - Ocean Resort - Savoy Signature is 23 km from Madeira International Airport.

name: Reid's Palace, A Belmond Hotel, Madeira
address: Estrada Monumental 139, 9000-098 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff in 10 acres of subtropical gardens overlooking the Atlantic, this 5-star resort features an oceanfront spa, 3 swimming pools and direct access to oceanic waters. All rooms at Reid's Palace are elegantly furnished and include a balcony and marble bathroom with amenities. A minibar with complimentary soft drinks and free in-room movies are available to each room. Reid’s Palace Spa features indoor and outdoor therapy suites with a private whirlpool. It offers an indulgent menu of treatments using world-class spa brands. Dry and wet saunas are also on site. Active guests can play a match on the tennis courts, or get energised with cardiovascular equipment at the modern gym. Madeira's finest ingredients are brought to life at Michelin-starred William Restaurant, while the Villa Cipriani serves classic Italian dishes. The Dining Room organises elegant soirees in Edwardian ambiance, during the winter season. The Reid’s is 3 km from Praia Formosa Beach and 15 minutes’ walk to Funchal city centre with plenty of nightlife. It provides free private parking.

name: Porto Santa Maria Hotel
address: Avenida do Mar e Das Comunidades Madeirenses, 50, 9050-029 Funchal, Madeira
description: Porto Santa Maria is located at the water's edge with direct access to the sea front promenade. Behind the hotel lies the old centre of Funchal, the well-known "old town". Its close relationship to the sea, the outstanding and exclusive views over the harbour where the cruise ships dock, its picturesque surroundings and the unique flavours of its cuisine result in genuine urban tranquility. The Porto Santa Marias location is fantastic for both the actively inclined and those who would prefer to relax and listen to the breaking of waves. A congenial hotel offering 146 rooms, restaurant, bars with terrace, direct access to the promenade, outdoor pool, indoor pool, SPA, gym, parking (extra fee). all in the heart of the city. Porto Santa Maria is an adult only hotel, only accepting reservations for guests over 16 years old.iHotelier/iStay

name: Pestana Village
address: Estrada Monumental 182/194, 9000-098 Funchal, Madeira
description: Surrounded by an extensive tropical garden, Pestana Village Garden Resort offers studios equipped with balconies with views of the outdoor pool and sun-lounger terrace. The centre of Funchal is a 15-minute walk. The well-appointed studios at Garden Resort have a traditional Madeira décor with warm colours, tiled floors, and iron furnishings. A flat-screen cable TV and a kitchenette are fitted in each unit. Massage treatments can be enjoyed in the gazebo on the pool deck. Inside, guests can relax in the sauna or hot tub and there is a pool surrounded by cushioned loungers. In the game room, billiards can be played. Pestana Village Garden Resort Aparthotel is a 20-minute drive from Funchal International Airport. Paid private parking is available.

name: Hotel Orca Praia
address: Estrada Monumental 355, 9000-236 Funchal, Madeira
description: Situated on a cliff overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and a sandy beach, this hotel is 6 km from the centre of Funchal. It features an outdoor pool with panoramic views and spacious guestrooms with private balconies. Rooms at the Hotel Orca Praia have stylish furnishings and a seating area with satellite TV. They come equipped with a small refrigerator, on request, and a private bathroom with solar-heated hot water and a hairdryer. In the morning, the hotel serves a buffet breakfast with fresh pastries and juice. There is a cocktail bar and a restaurant with floor-to-ceiling windows that serves international cuisine. Guests can enjoy an aromatherapy massage at the spa, or rent a bicycle and explore the seaside. There is also a games room with billiards and table tennis. Hotel Orca Praia is 2 km from the fishing village Camara de Lobos. Madeira Airport is 15 km away. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service and free on-site public parking.

name: The Reserve
address: Avenida do Infante 25 B, 9004-542 Funchal, Madeira
description: Situated in Funchal, 1.7 km from Gorgulho - Gavinas Beach, The Reserve features accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Attractively situated in the Se district, this hotel provides a bar, as well as a hot tub. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, evening entertainment and room service. At the hotel rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Popular points of interest near The Reserve include Almirante Reis Beach, Marina do Funchal and Madeira Casino. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Sentido Galosol
address: Rua D. Francisco Santana, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: This beach resort in Caniço, Madeira offers a gym, massage services and beauty treatments. It has 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 3 pools and panoramic sea views. Funchal’s centre is a 20-minute drive away. The rooms at the 4-star Galo Resort Hotel Galosol have a balcony with panoramic sea views. They also have air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. All rooms have free WiFi access. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxation treatments at the spa, including stone massages, pedicures and manicures. They can also attend aerobics or yoga classes and anti-stress programs. A diving centre is also available. The Hotel Galosol also features a restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace overlooking the ocean. The Galo Resort is a 20-minute drive from Madeira Airport.

name: Hotel Quintinha São João & Spa
address: Rua da Levada de Sao Joao, 4, 9000-191 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set in lush, landscaped gardens, 5-star Quintinha São João features a spa and indoor and outdoor heated swimming pools. Overlooking central Funchal and the bay, it is 2 km from Funchal Cathedral. The spacious, elegant rooms provide a cable TV with DVD player, a minibar and private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a private, furnished balcony with views of the garden or Funchal Bay. The hotel has 2 bars and a restaurant serving a selection of Portuguese and international cuisine, as well as Goan specialities. The spa includes a sauna, hot tub and massage rooms, and there is a small gym, games room and free WiFi in public areas. The 24-hour reception staff aim are on hand to provide assistance. There is a free indoor car park on site and Quintinha São João Hotel offers a free shuttle service to/from Funchal Marina.

name: Pestana Palms
address: Rua do Gorgulho, 17, 9000-107 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set within a leafy garden, this apart-hotel boasts an outdoor pool overlooking Funchal coastal cliffs. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel‘s studios are spacious and decorated with soft beige colours. Each one has low-back armchairs in the lounge area and TV with multilingual cable channels. A Flor do Mar Restaurant has large windows overlooking the ocean and also hosts regular entertainment events. Salads, light snacks and cakes are available in the cosy Vila Lido Tea Room. The hotel’s attentive staff can organize outdoor excursions around the coastline. The apart-hotel’s surrounding area also features nature and walking trails. Pestana Vila Lido Madeira Ocean Hotel is 2 km away from Funchal town centre’s local museums. Free parking is available on site, subject to availability.

name: The Residence at Vila Porto Mare
address: Rua de Leichlingen 7, 9004-566 Funchal, Madeira
description: Occupying the west wing of the Vila Porto Mare resort, The Residence enjoys the use of all its facilities and a real sense of community. A wide selection of carefully furnished and fully equipped apartments where comfort is our motto. The 99 units divided into studios, one and two bedroom apartments are decorated with a touch of exoticism. The Residence apartments combine views over the ocean with tropical gardens. The 13,400 m2 of gardens at the Vila Porto Mare resort have created one of the most interesting botanical oasis's on Madeira island. The subtropical gardens, with over 500 unique and identified botanical species have turned this space into a real paradise. Discover our little secret. the orchid corner! 4 restaurants, 3 bars, five pools, SPA, sports and children's facilities. With an innovative concept, the Vila Porto Mare resort offers facilities which are shared by three hotels Suite Hotel Eden Mar, Hotel Porto Mare and The Residence; however, the character of each one of these is guaranteed by individual receptions and different room/apartment types.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Alpino Atlantico Ayurveda Cure Centre - Adults Only
address: Rua da Falesia 12, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: Galo Resort Alpino Atlantico Ayurveda is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Madeira Island. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the property's wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, room service, restaurant, dry cleaning. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Galo Resort Alpino Atlantico Ayurveda combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Madeira Island unforgettable.Agoda

name: Sentido Galomar - Adults Only
address: Rua D Francisco Santana 10, 9125-909 Caniço, Madeira
description: Perched on a cliff at Ponta D’Oliveira, Galo Resort Hotel Galomar offers stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean. It features direct sea access and indoor and outdoor pools. The rooms at Hotel Galomar are decorated in a modern style. All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private balcony with scenic sea views. The Ashoka Spa offers a wide variety of treatments, including Ayurveda therapy. It also offers saunas and a hot tub. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood at Restaurant Atlantis, at Hotel Galosol also features our buffet restaurant which serves local and international cuisine which can be enjoyed on the terrace.The Blue Bar at Galosol and Capoeira Pub offer a wide variety of drinks and snacks. Caniço’s centre is 2.5 km from Galo Resort Hotel Galomar, and Funchal’s centre is 12 km away.

name: Palheiro Village
address: Estrada do Aeroporto, No. 65, 9060-382 Funchal, Madeira
description: With a stay at Palheiro Village in Funchal (Sao Goncalo), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Pinnacle Viewpoint and Civic Center of Santa Maria Maior. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: The Cliff Bay
address: Estrada Monumental 147, 9004-532 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Atlantic Ocean stretches as far as the eye can see at the foot of The Cliff Bay. Perched on the top of a natural promontory, the hotel is surrounded by gardens - with innumerable secluded corners and centenary palm trees extending to the very edge of the cliff face. The panorama is completed by a magnificent view over the bay of Funchal to the east of the hotel. This 5 star hotel, one of PortoBay Hotels premium resorts, assures that every single little detail has been carefully conceived to present genuine peace, well-being and elegance. In the hotels sea access area one can combine the Atlantic Ocean breeze with the spell-binding views when choosing the new pontoons and solariums. The most influential restaurant guide in the world, the Michelin Guide, has awarded the Il Gallo d'Oro, The Cliff Bay's gourmet restaurant, run by Chef Benot Sinthon, with 2 Stars.iHotelier/iStay

name: Village Cabo Girao
address: Rua 1º De Julho, Nº 2, 9300-081 Câmara de Lobos, Madeira
description: Located on a slope overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Village Cabo Girao offers villas and apartments with access to indoor and outdoor swimming pools, free private parking and free WiFi in shared areas. Surrounded by tropical vegetation the accommodations include a living room with flat-screen satellite TV, a DVD player, a telephone and a dining area. Guests can prepare their own meals using the fully equipped kitchenettes. Village Cabo Girao features a restaurant that serves traditional Madeira cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and a snack bar that serves pastries and coffee. A mini-market on site allows guests to buy supplies for their stay. The staff of Village Cabo Girao can provide car rental, tour guide and shuttle services. Guests can enjoy the Spa with sauna and massage facilities. A games room with billiards and table soccer is available as well as a tennis court and minigolf are at guests’ disposal free of charge. Madeira International Airport is located 30 Km away and the city of Funchal is at a 14-minute drive. Curral das Freiras is 23 Km away and the village of São Vicente situated in the northern coast of Madeira is at a 28-minute drive.

name: Torre Praia Hotel
address: Rua Goulart Medeiros, Porto Santo, Madeira
description: Situated on the golden sandy beach of Vila de Porto Santo, this 4-star hotel provides a sauna, massage treatments and an outdoor pool. The chic, modern rooms lead onto balconies. The rooms are spacious and bright, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows. Some have picturesque views over the beach and the Atlantic Ocean. Guests can enjoy a workout in the gym or a game of squash on the court. For relaxation, Hotel Torre Praia provides a hot tub and a library. Free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception are also offered. Hotel Torre Praia has 2 on-site restaurants. With both located by the beach, guests can sample regional, Italian and international dishes while admiring the panoramic view. The snack bar by the pool offers light snacks and drinks. The Torre Praia provides free parking and a car rental service as well.

name: Pestana Porto Santo
address: Estrada Regional 120, 9400-242 Porto Santo, Madeira
description: With a private stretch of sandy beach along the Porto Santo shore, this 5-star resort in Southern Madeira features 2 natural-style pool areas surrounded by 30.000 m² of gardens. A private balcony and wall-mounted flat-screen TVs are standard in Pestana Porto Santo Beach Resort & SPA’s rooms. They are elegantly decorated in the blue and green shades of the ocean. Pestana Porto Santo Beach Resort & SPA features 3 restaurants and 2 bars, offering a selection of Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. Views of the Atlantic Ocean can be enjoyed at the Sunset Bar. The spa area includes a heated pool with water jets, wet and dry saunas and an aromatic steam bath. Guests can train in the gym, or play a game of tennis on the multi-purpose court. Porto Santo Airport is about 4 km away, while Madeira Island Airport is 54.5 km of the Pestana Porto Santo.

name: Vidamar Resort Hotel Madeira - Dine Around Half Board
address: Estrada Monumental 175-177, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: A popular hotel due to its extensive 5-star facilities and exclusive DINE AROUND meal plan. Competitively priced large sea front rooms with balconies and King Size beds. Thalasso Sea Spa and free membership to the exclusive VIDA health and fitness club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Dorisol Estrelicia Hotel
address: Rua da Casa Branca, 98, 9004-535 Funchal, Madeira
description: Dorisol Estrelicia offers panoramic views over Funchal bay and a vast array of facilities within Dorisol Complex. Centre of Funchal is 2 km away. The hotel’s modern rooms are equipped with cable TV and a work desk. Many have views over the hillside towards the Atlantic Ocean. The Dorisol Estrelicia offers a mini-spa with massage room, indoor pool and a gym. Guests can also find billiards, darts and table tennis in the recreation room. The ground-floor restaurant serves breakfast buffets and evening dinners. During summer, music nights are organized on a regular basis at the terrace bar. Guests can also enjoy live music and a happy hour in the piano bar. The Dorisol Estrelicia is 500 metres away from the seaside promenade of Funchal and the Lido swimming complex. Madeira’s international airport is 20 km away.

name: Yeotown Health Retreat
address: Caminho do Verde 60 Arco da Calheta, 9370-729 Estreito da Calheta, Madeira
description: Yeotown Health Retreat features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Arco da Calheta. This 5-star hotel offers room service and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is located 25 km from Girao Cape. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe, bed linen and a balcony with a mountain view. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Yeotown Health Retreat also offer a sea view. An à la carte, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Porto Moniz Natural Swimming Pools is 34 km from the accommodation, while Marina do Funchal is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International Airport, 52 km from Yeotown Health Retreat.

name: Pestana Miramar
address: Estrada Monumental, 182/194, 9000-098 Funchal, Madeira
description: This 4-star is within walking distance of the beach and Funchal City Centre. Built on the site of the historic Hotel Miramar, it features classic architecture and landscaping, with mountain and sea views. The rooms at Pestana Miramar are air conditioned and feature en-suite bathrooms with bathtubs. Miramar has both an outdoor and indoor pool. There is a health club with a fully-equipped fitness centre, sauna and hot tub. Massages, beauty treatments and hairdresser services are also available. The restaurant serves gourmet cuisine and fine wine. Guests can relax in the popular Miramar gardens, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean. Free WiFi is availablein the public areas of the hotel. Private parking is available, at an extra fee.

name: Albatroz Beach & Yacht Club
address: Quinta Dr. Americo Durao, 9100-187 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Boasting 400 meters of private sea front, this 5-star property offers spacious rooms all with balcony and views of the Atlantic and the Deserted Islands. There are 3 pools, 2 at the sea level with sea water and private access to the sea and 1 at the hotel level with heated water. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Hotel Albatroz Madeira’s rooms have free tea and coffee making facilities and include nautical motifs and traditional hand-painted tile panels. Each bathroom has a double basin sink and includes a bathrobe with slippers. Guests at the Albatroz can relax by the pools and enjoy the views over Santa Cruz Bay. It is also possible to play a game of tennis or to practice the swing at the Santo da Serra championship golf course, 2 km away. The à la carte restaurant serves a Mediterranean menu as well as local dishes. The indoor area offers windows with stunning sea views. It is also possible to eat outdoors by the pool bar. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange complementary airport shuttles to Madeira Airport, a 5-minute drive away. It is also possible to rent a car and drive up to Funchal, 20-minutes away. Free parking is available.

name: Monte Mar Palace Hotel
address: Sítio do Montado, São Vicente, Madeira
description: The Montemar Palace hotel is a 4-star hotel, designed to cater for the high standards of the new millennium with its modern design, equipment and spacious leisure areas. It is located in a rural area (60km/ 50 minutes away from the airport by car), overlooking the crystal clear Atlantic ocean and the beautiful ‘Laurissilva’ forest on the north coast of the island of Madeira. The hotel is set in an area of absolute silence, with lovely surroundings and magnificent views in a sub-tropical climate with an average temperature of 19ºC.

name: Quinta Mirabela - Design Hotel
address: Caminho do Monte, 105, Funchal, Madeira
description: Panoramic terrace and rooms overlooking the Funchal Bay await guests at this 5-star hotel. Located 2 km from Funchal, it also features a sea-view outdoor pool and a spa with massages. The air-conditioned rooms at the Quinta Mirabela include satellite TV, a minibar and safety deposit box. The marble bathrooms come with bathrobes and hairdryers. Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool, or relax at the spa, which has a hammam, a hot tub and a sauna. There is also a modern gym equipped with cardiovascular equipment and free weights. The Mirabela’s elegant restaurant serves Madeiran and international cuisine, which can be enjoyed on the panoramic terrace. Stephan’s Bar offers exotic cocktails, while the pool bar serves natural fruit juices.

name: Bio Hotel - Hotel Quinta Da Serra
address: Estrada Do Chote 4/6, 9325-140 Câmara de Lobos, Madeira
description: Located in Jardim da Serra Village, the 5-star BIO Hotel - Hotel Quinta da Serra is in a lush green valley, 820 metres above sea-level. Next to the hotel's garden area there is an indoor pool, hot tub and a Spa & Wellness centre. Each of the Quinta da Serra’s modern air conditioned rooms and suites comes equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar. Each includes a fully equipped bathroom with hairdryer and bathtub. All units feature a balcony, and have free WiFi access. Rooms at the old farmhouse are also available. Guests may have a taste of Madeira’s cuisine in the hotel’s restaurant, which has valley and Ocean views. The unit has its own organic produce, which are used in the making of the high-standard dishes. A 24-hour room service is provided, at an extra cost. Hotel Quinta has 2 bars, one of which on the terrace of the indoor pool, where guests can enjoy a refreshing drink or a light meal. The hotel’s garden area has a varied flora, which includes the island’s tallest recorded eucalyptus tree. The old Quinta building has a games room with billiards, a fireplace and a library. Guest may enjoy a massage at the Spa, attend the gym overlooking the gardens or take a sauna. The Hotel also has a fully-equipped a conference room. The Funchal centre is within a 30-minute drive and features many restaurants, bars and shops. Madeira Airport is a 45-minute drive from the BIO Hotel - Hotel Quinta da Serra.

name: Melia Madeira Mare
address: Rua Leichlingen, Nº 2-4, 9000-003 Funchal, Madeira
description: Located close to Funchal’s city centre, overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Meliã Madeira Mare offers free WiFi, an indoor and outdoor pool and a spa. Its elegantly-furnished rooms offer a balcony and cable TV. Some rooms of Melia Madeira Mare include scenic views of the Atlantic Ocean from the balcony. Many of the hotel’s rooms also have a seating area. Guests can relax in the sauna at Melia Madeira Mare’s spa. Massage treatments and a steam bath are also offered. Melia Madeira Mare’s restaurant serves a breakfast buffet and an a la carte menu for dinner. The hotel’s pool bar provides refreshing beverages. Free parking is available. Madeira International Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Melia Madeira Mare is a 14-minute drive from the city centre.

name: Hotel Jardim Atlantico
address: Caminho Lombo da Rocha, 1 Prazeres, 9370-612 Prazeres, Madeira
description: Set in tranquil Prazeres with Atlantic Ocean and mountain views, this 4-star hotel offers self-catering accommodation within 2 km of the Natural Park of Madeira. Rooms at the Jardim Atlantico have contemporary décor and include a satellite TV, kitchen and seating area. Rooms also offer balconies with panoramic views of the countryside. The breakfast buffet includes fresh bread, fresh fruit and homemade jams. For lunch and dinner, the restaurant prepares regional and international dishes made with fresh, local ingredients. The bar at Hotel Jardim Atlantico serves cocktails on the terrace, where guests can enjoy picturesque views of the Atlantic Ocean. Guests can relax poolside by the outdoor and indoor pools, or get a stone massage at the spa. Alternatively, they can go for a stroll through the Madeira countryside. Jardim Atlantico can be reached via the airport shuttle. Free parking is available at the hotel.

name: Rocamar Lido Resort
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira 7, Caniço de Baixo, Apartado 23, Canico, 9125-028 Caniço, Madeira
description: Set on a cliff overlooking the ocean, Roca Mar features a solarium and an outdoor pool. Located in Caniço de Baixo, it offers spacious rooms with a private balcony. Hotel Roca Mar’s rooms are bright and sunny with glass sliding doors opening onto a furnished balcony. Each one has a lounge area with a plush armchair, work desk and cable TV. Roca Mar’s restaurant specializes in seafood including sword fish and octopus, all served alongside regional wines. Guests can also enjoy live music shows at the Bar Restaurant. Roca Mar Hotel is 8 km from Madeira Airport. Palheiro Golf Course is 20 minutes’ drive away. Hotel minibus to Funchal available on weekdays (subject to availability and payment).

name: Hotel Apartamento Cais Da Oliveira
address: Caminho Cais da Oliveira, Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Boasting a cliff-top location a 10-minute drive from Funchal, this 4-star hotel features studios and suites with a private balcony. It has a private access to the beach, a waterfront terrace and 2 pools. The air-conditioned accommodations at Caniço's Hotel Cais da Oliveira include satellite TV and a kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator. Each private bathroom has a shower and hairdryer. Hotel Cais da Oliveira features an à la carte restaurant. The bar serves refreshing drinks and cocktails. Guests may also go for a work-out in the fitness centre, or even relax at the solarium, both situated at the next-door Royal Orchid Hotel. The unit is located 2 km from the centre of Caniço. For golfing enthusiasts, the property is 8 km away from Palheiro Golf and 15 km from the Santo da Serra Golf Course. On weekdays, the 24-hour reception staff provides a minibus service to Funchal (subject to availability and payment), which is a 10-minute drive away. It is also possible to rent cars and bikes. The property is is 9 km from Madeira’s International Airport.

name: Balancal Apartments and Villas Palheiro Village
address: São Gonçalo
description: Located in Funchal, Balancal Apartments offers an outdoor pool. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi. The property is 1 km from Palheiro Golf Course. The apartments will provide guests with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a hairdryer, the private bathrooms also comes with a bidet and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy sea view and city view from the room. Guests can prepare their own meals in the fully equipped kitchen that each apartment provides. Alternatively guests can taste the local gastronomy at the restaurant on site. The Ecological Park of Funchal is 10 km away and the Old Town centre is 6 km away. Reis Magos Beach is 11 km away and the city of Machico with its golden sand beach is 20 km away. Madeira International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Porto Mare Hotel
address: Rua Simplicio Passos Gouveia 21, 9004-565 Funchal, Madeira
description: The Porto Mare hotel occupies the centre of the Vila Porto Mare resort and benefits from the use of all its facilities. There are many different corners and atmospheres here. something new to discover every day. The 198 rooms combine views over the ocean with tropical gardens. 4 restaurants, 3 bars, five pools, SPA, sports and children's facilities. The 13,400 m2 of gardens at the Vila Porto Mare resort have created one of the most interesting botanical oasis's on Madeira island. The subtropical gardens, with over 500 unique and identified botanical species have turned this space into a real paradise. Discover our little secret. the orchid corner! With an innovative concept, the Vila Porto Mare resort offers facilities which are shared by three hotels Suite Hotel Eden Mar, Hotel Porto Mare and The Residence; however, the character of each one of these is guaranteed by individual receptions and different room/apartment types.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Girassol - Suite Hotel
address: Estrada Monumental 256, 9004-539 Funchal, Madeira
description: Set in tropical palm gardens with 2 swimming pools and views of the Atlantic Ocean, Hotel Girassol offers modern and spacious rooms with private balconies. Accommodations at Hotel Girassol are decorated in warm colours and have floor-to-ceiling windows opening onto the balcony. The rooms and suites have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The Hotel renovated all the public areas towards the end of 2016. The spacious restaurant borders the garden and offers salads and pastas. Restaurant has a terrace and offers different choices of fish, meat, salads and pastas. Guests can enjoy an evening drink from the modern First Lounge Bar. The pool area features a sundeck as well as a partly covered terrace. The Girassol is situated 2 km away from the Funchal’s city centre, which is a 30-minute walk away. The 24-hour staff can arrange car rentals and free private parking is available.

name: Suite Hotel Eden Mar
address: Rua do Gorgulho 2, 9004-537 Funchal, Madeira
description: The first hotel of the chain, Suite Hotel Eden Mar, with 146 rooms, guarantee high levels of comfort and tranquility for its guests. The Eden Mar is an integral part of the Vila Porto Mare resort and shares facilities with two other hotels - Porto Mare and The Residence 5 pools, 4 restaurants, 3 bars, subtropical gardens and sports fields. The identity of each of the hotels is ensured though the separate reception areas and the types of rooms they offer. The 13,400 m2 of gardens at the Vila Porto Mare resort have created one of the most interesting botanical oasis's on Madeira island. The subtropical gardens, with over 500 unique and identified botanical species have turned this space into a real paradise. Discover our little secret.the orchid corner!iHotelier/iStay

name: Pestana Ocean Bay
address: Praia Formosa Barranco do Porto Mos - 8600, 9000-247 Funchal, Madeira
description: This superb beach apartment complex offers impressive views over the majestic cliffs of Cabo Girao. The complex enjoys an idyllic setting just 50 metres away from the Praia Formosa Beach, offering guests the perfect location from which to enjoy leisurely, moonlit strolls or to simply lie back and revel in the intrinsic beauty of the surroundings. The centre of the lively city of Funchal is just 5 kms away, where guests can explore the myriad of shopping opportunities, charming restaurants, exciting entertainment venues and attractions it has to offer. The complex provides a complimentary bus service to the heart of the city. The complex also offers beautifully appointed apartments, which provide a warm, relaxing home away from home. Guests will appreciate the array of exceptional leisure and recreational facilities the complex has to offer.FarePortal

name: Quinta da Bela Vista
address: Caminho Avista Navios, 4 Funchal, Funchal, Madeira
description: This exclusive 5-star hotel in Madeira offers elegant rooms with a private balcony featuring views of the surrounding botanical gardens or the Bay of Funchal. Facilities include an outdoor pool. Quinta da Bela Vista is decorated with fine paintings and antique furniture throughout. The air-conditioned rooms have cable TV, a seating area, and a luxurious marble bathroom. Guests can explore the Atlantic Ocean by renting Quinta da Bela Vista’s very own yacht. It also offers a tennis court, a sauna, a fitness centre, and a concierge service. Restaurant Avista Navios serves international dishes with traditional Madeiran flavours in a warm setting with wooden furniture, a fireplace and marble floors. Snacks, drinks and cocktails are served at the pool bar, which has stunning views over the Bay of Funchal. Quinta da Bela Vista is just 2 km from Funchal’s city centre, where guests can visit the Sé Cathedral, the Frederico de Freitas Museum or the Museum of Contemporary Art.

name: Dorisol Mimosa Studio Hotel
address: Rua da Casa Branca 98, 9004-535 Funchal, Madeira
description: Dorisol Mimosa Studio Hotel is located in Madeira, Funchal, 500 metres away from the seaside promenade. It offers views over Funchal bay. Dorisol Mimosa Studio Hotel feature studios fitted with a kitchenette, seating area, cable TV and free WiFi. Guests can enjoy panoramic views from the balcony. The Terrace Restaurant serves international cuisine by the pool. Mimosa guests also have access to the Dorisol Madeira Complex’s wellness centre and a piano bar that features live music. Guests can relax on a sun lounger by the pool, or visit the games room with darts, billiards and table tennis. There is also a fitness centre with free weights and cardiovascular equipment. The Dorisol Mimosa aparthotel is located 2 km from Funchal’s city-centre and is less than 2 km from the Madeira Casino. The hotel offers 24-hour front desk service.

name: Hotel Riu Madeira
address: Praia Dos Reis Magos, 9125-024 Caniço, Madeira
description: CheckIn:3.00 pm. Checkout:11.00 am Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a reception hall. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 13 kilometers. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and an elevator. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. #Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a reception hall. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 13 kilometers. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and an elevator. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Indoor swimming pool, open in the winter months **Each room must have the name of the corresponding Holder, no blockades in the name of the same owner. Advisable one locator per room. If several rooms have been reserved on the same locator, in the case that modification and / or cancellation is requested on any of them, the conditions and / or advantages received with certain advance will be lost, re-pricing the reservation at the current price. Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon Mandatory Fees and Taxes You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.00 per person, per night, up to 5 nights. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book. Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy. Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges. Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed. No onsite parking is available. Make yourself at home in one of the 327 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 1.00 per person, per night, up to 5 nights. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. However, charges can vary, for example, based on length of stay or the room you book.Ticket Package

name: Madeira Panoramico Hotel
address: Rua Estados Unidos da America 34, 9000-090 Funchal, Madeira
description: Boasting magnificent views of Funchal and the Atlantic Ocean, just 3 km from the city centre, this hotel features indoor and outdoor pools and a deluxe spa. All rooms at Madeira Panorâmico Hotel have a private balcony, where guests can relax. All the rooms are air-conditioned and all have a flat-screen TV. Traditional Portuguese dishes are served in a buffet style or à la carte at the Madeira Panorâmico’s restaurant. Local drinks can be sampled at the bar while admiring the Atlantic Ocean view. Madeira Panorâmico Hotel’s spa has a massage room, a sauna and a hot tub. For those who like to keep active, a game of squash or tennis can be enjoyed on the court and there is a fitness centre on site as well. Guests can benefit from the 24-hour front desk, car rental and free parking. Situated close to Quinta Magnolia Garden, the Madeira Panorâmico is just a 15-minute drive from Madeira Airport.

name: Pestana Madeira Beach Club
address: Largo Antonio Nobre nº1, Funchal Ilha da Madeira, 9000-100 Funchal, Madeira
description: What strikes your fancy, the city or the sea? Just walking distance from the capital Funchal, this resort has all the city has to offer, but is graced with a seaside view and a multitude of amenities. Head to the sea for water sports when you want a little adventure, or take advantage of all the resort offers including two pools and all the facilities of the Carlton Hotel, including the restaurants, nightclub, bars, tea room, beauty salon, fitness center and tennis court.Ticket Package

name: Torrinha Garten Apartment
address: 58 Rua da Torrinha, 9050-234 Funchal, Madeira
description: Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Torrinha Garten Apartment is situated in Funchal. Private parking is available on site. The bed and breakfast comes with a flat-screen TV. The kitchen features a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave and there is walk-in shower with bathrobes and a hair dryer. At the bed and breakfast guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and garden at Torrinha Garten Apartment. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Almirante Reis Beach, Marina do Funchal and Cathedral of Funchal. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International, 20 km from Torrinha Garten Apartment, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Quinta Do Furao
address: Achada do Gramacho, Santana, Madeira
description: Featuring stunning views of the north-east coast of the Island of Madeira and the surrounding mountains, this 4-star hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and a balcony. Facilities include an outdoor pool. The rooms at Hotel Quinta Do Furão are decorated with natural colours and elegant wooden furniture. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and tea and coffee making facilities. Quinta Do Furão Hotel’s restaurant serves a selection of typical Madeiran dishes and international gourmet cuisine. Guests can taste and purchase 4 different types of Madeiran wine at the hotel’s wine cellar. The hotel offers various wellness facilities, such as a sauna, a fitness room, and a massage room. Guests can also benefit from Quinta Do Furão’s games room, reading room, and 24-hour reception. Santana, a small and picturesque city known for its thatched houses, is just 2 km from Hotel Quinta Do Furão. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Hotel Royal Orchid
address: Travessa Vista da Praia, PO Box 38, Canico, 9125-039 Caniço, Madeira
description: Overlooking the Atlantic, this beachfront hotel offers private access to the Ocean, 2 pools and a wellness centre. Hotel minibus to Funchal available on weekdays (subject to availability and payment). The rooms, studios and suites at Hotel Royal Orchid are modern in style and include an LCD TV and air conditioning. Each accommodation has a kitchenette and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Sister Hotel Rocamar's restaurant provides lots of daylight and serves regional as well as international cuisine, including freshly caught fish and tender beef. Madeira wine is available at the Bar. Besides the heated indoor pool and outdoor pool, guests can enjoy massages or visit the sauna and steam bath in the Nautilus Health Club. Sun beds, umbrellas and showers are available at the sun terrace, which overlooks Caniço Bay. Hotel Royal Orchid is just a 20 minutes’ drive away from Funchal, Palheiro Golf Course and the Santo da Serra Golf Course. The hotel offers paid parking as well as a car-rental and bike-rental service. All services and facilities from the neighbouring Hotels Roca Mar and Cais da Oliveira are available to the Royal Orchid guests during their stay.

name: Pestana Royal
address: Estrada Monumental, Nr. 275, 9000-250 Funchal, Madeira
description: No description found

name: Hotel Do Campo
address: Estrada Da Banda De Além, 25, 9350-232 Ribeira Brava, Madeira
description: Do Campo is an eco-friendly hotel, perched on a cliff overlooking Madeira’s laurisilva forests and the Atlantic Ocean. It features an elevated salt-water swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers. Guests will enjoy the hotel’s gym, equipped with cardio and fitness machines, or relax at the on-site spa, offering a hot tub and Turkish bath. A reading room with free Wi-Fi and a games room are also available. Bright and airy, rooms at Hotel Do Campo open out on to panoramic balconies. They are all equipped with extra-long beds, a seating area and satellite TV channels. En-suite bathrooms with bathtub are standard. Traditional specialities are served at the restaurant and the bar, using locally grown aromatic herbs. Many eateries and entertaining options can be found in downtown Funchal, a 15-minute drive from Do Campo hotel.

name: Estalagem do Vale
address: Rua Dr. Gregório Dinis, 37 Sitio Das Feiteiras de Baixo, 9240-206 São Vicente, Madeira
description: Overlooking the valleys of São Vicente, this restored 18th-century manor house features a garden with a heated swimming pool. Guest can enjoy the on-site wellness facilities and the traditional restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at Estalagem do Vale come with a satellite TV and work desk. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace, while other rooms are decorated in a traditional style with dark wooden furniture. A breakfast buffet is served daily indoors or on the terrace. Guest can try traditional dishes from North coast of Madeira at Restaurant Caramujo. The Adega Croque bar offers tea and local cakes, and there is a snack bar. The sauna, solarium and Turkish bath offer relaxation after a busy day in Funchal, a 25-minute drive away. Alternatively, guests can read a book from the library or listen to the sounds of the crickets by the pool. The hotel is situated within the World Heritage Site of the ancient Laurissilva Forests, 2 km from São Vicente. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals and organise tours around the island.

name: Dazk Golden Estate
address: Estrada de São João nº 28 Sitio do Barreiro, 9350-103 Ribeira Brava, Madeira
description: Dazk Golden Estate in Ribeira Brava provides adults-only accommodation with pool with a view, a fitness centre and an open-air bath. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The guest house has an outdoor fireplace and a spa facilities. At the guest house, every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and some have sea views. At Dazk Golden Estate every room has bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Dazk Golden Estate offers a range of wellness facilities including a wellness packages, a public bath and a solarium. Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ribeira Brava, like cycling. Ribeira Brava Beach is 2.6 km from Dazk Golden Estate, while Girao Cape is 9.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cristiano Ronaldo Madeira International, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Suite Deluxe Blue
address: Caminho Do Telegrafo, 17, 9125-258 Santa Cruz, Madeira
description: Inside an early 20th century farmhouse, a suite with a private bathroom and a breathtaking view of this room. A LARGE FAMILY ROOM WITH TOTAL PRIVACY AND PRIVATE ENTRY, HAS MORE THAN 120M2. HAS KITCHEN KITCHEN ZONE IS EQUIPPED, TWO BEDROOM PRIVATIVES PLUS A ZONE OF 4 BELICHES. INSERTED in a charming little farmhouse built in the third part of the twentieth century, completely transformed and remodeled to satisfy you and your family. A unique environment with a mountain and sea view. A peace of mind. Here you will find a fully equipped gym as well as a mountain bike or rent a car and other small luxuries and also courtesy car to make your transfers to the airport which is only 7 minutes from the property. More than 4000m2 of land and areas where it is in contact with nature. We also offer a large swimming pool, a restaurant, a lounge bar and a sunbathing and reading area.VRBO

name: Deluxe King Suite
address: Caminho Do Telegrafo, 17, 9125-258 Caniço, Madeira
description: This is an excellent room with an interior garden in the bathroom. A private room with complete privacy and a direct view of the pool area with large double glazed windows. Housed in a charming little farmhouse built in the third part of the twentieth century, transformed and completely refurbished to satisfy you and your family. A unique environment with a mountain and sea view. A great peace of mind. Here you will find a fully equipped gym as well as mountain biking or rent a car and other small luxuries and courtesy car to make your transfers to the airport which is just 7 minutes from the property. More than 4000m2 of land and areas where it is in contact with nature. We also offer a large pool, a restaurant, a lounge bar and a lounge and reading area.VRBO
